org.letras.ps.rawdata.driver.anoto.adp301
Class PenAdapterNativeAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.letras.ps.rawdata.driver.anoto.adp301.PenAdapterNativeAdapter

public class PenAdapterNativeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

The PenAdapterNativeAdapter is an adapter to ease communication between the native driver part and the IPenAdapter. The adapter hides the IPenState and the PenSample class from the native code.

Author:
niklas

Constructor Summary
PenAdapterNativeAdapter(IPenAdapter penAdapter)
          constructor needs the penAdapter that should be encapsulated

Constructor Detail

PenAdapterNativeAdapter

public PenAdapterNativeAdapter(IPenAdapter penAdapter)
constructor needs the penAdapter that should be encapsulated

Parameters:
penAdapter -
Method Detail

penDown

public void penDown()
switch to pen-down state sending the pen-down event if necessary. This should be called before calling sendSample().

penUp

public void penUp()
switch to pen-up state sending the pen-up event if necessary

penDisconnected

public void penDisconnected()
change to the pen-disconnected state. This does not however shutdown the PenService.

penConnected

public void penConnected()
change to the pen-connected state. This should be called prior to sending pen-down or samples.

sendSample

public void sendSample(double x,
                       double y,
                       int force)
send a sample with the given coordinates and pen pressure. The current time will be used as timestamp when creating the PenSample.

Parameters:
x - the Anoto x-coordinate
y - the Anoto y-coordinate
force - the pen pressure
